casebody.data:
2002-1443 (La. 10/14/02)

Byron K. LANDRY v. Luke BELLANGER, Jr. No. 2002-C-1443. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Bellanger, Luke Jr.; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Lafourche, 17th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 81,056; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2000 CA 2029.

Granted.
